ANELE.IS.long_name: Anel Elektrik Proje Taahhüt ve Ticaret Anonim Sirketi
ANELE.IS.summary: Anel Elektrik Proje TaahhÃ¼t ve Ticaret Anonim Sirketi, together with its subsidiaries, provides mechanical, electrical, and plumbing engineering (MEP) services. The company operates through Project Commitment, Rent of Land and Buildings, Telecommunications, Ship Electrical and Electronics, and Energy segments. It provides solutions in the area of MEP operation and maintenance, low voltage panel production, recycling, and ship electric and electronic systems. The company undertakes various electrical and mechanical contracting projects, including airports, stadiums, rail systems, data centers, hospitals, hotels, business centers, and shopping centers. It also produces electrical energy from solar energy projects, as well as engages in the telecommunication activities. In addition, the company purchases and sells immovable property; and involved in Electricity and Electromechanical Contracting activities. Further, it offers designing, contracting, and maintenance repair services. The company operates in Turkey, Qatar, England, Holland, Russia, Bulgaria, Azerbaijan, and the United Arab Emirates. Anel Elektrik Proje TaahhÃ¼t ve Ticaret Anonim Sirketi was founded in 1986 and is headquartered in Istanbul, Turkey.

ENKAI.IS.summary: Enka Insaat ve Sanayi A.S., together with its subsidiaries, operates as a construction company in Turkey, Russia, Kazakhstan, Georgia, Iraq, and internationally. It operates through four segments: Construction, Rental, Energy, and Trading and Manufacturing. The company engages in the construction of industrial and social buildings, and motorways; construction and operation of natural gas fired electrical energy generation facilities; and investment in and development of real estate properties and shopping malls. It is also involved in the marketing and after-sale service of construction machineries, trucks, industrial products, and spare parts; manufacturing of structural steel works; installation and establishment of the technical equipment; and excavation backfilling works and quarrying crushing operation of highway projects. In addition, the company engages in the pile dwelling work; base and superstructure construction; slip form and construction of drilling and ground surveys; organization of conventions and seminars; tour reservations and tickets sales; production of ready-mixed concrete; production and sale of electricity; repair and maintenance of power plants; and provision of architectural design and air transportation services, as well as trading activities. Further, it is involved in various activities, such as material handling and storage systems, auxiliary facilities, water treatment and environmental engineering, infrastructure and construction, control systems, and instrumentation engineering activities. Enka Insaat ve Sanayi A.S. was founded in 1957 and is headquartered in Istanbul, Turkey.

NIBAS.IS.long_name: Nigbas Nigde Beton Sanayi Ve Ticaret A.S.
NIBAS.IS.summary: Nigbas Nigde Beton Sanayi Ve Ticaret A.S. manufactures and sells prefabricated concrete products and reinforced concrete structures in Turkey. It offers prefabricated building systems, including general service buildings, facilities for industrial and agricultural purposes, education and sports facilities, and precast infrastructure elements; and concrete electrification poles, such as mains, lightings, electricity transmission lines, and railway catenary poles. The company also provides construction materials, which include cement based building chemicals and ready-mixed concrete; and landscaping elements, such as concrete kerb units, concrete paving stones, concrete fence poles, and concrete flowerbeds. Nigbas Nigde Beton Sanayi Ve Ticaret A.S. was founded in 1969 and is based in Nigde, Turkey.

RALYH.IS.summary: Ral Yatirim Holding A.S. operates as a construction company in Turkey. The company was formerly known as Bisas Tekstil Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S and changed its name to Ral Yatirim Holding A.S. in March 2018. Ral Yatirim Holding A.S. was founded in 1976 and is headquartered in Ankara, Turkey.

TKFEN.IS.summary: Tekfen Holding Anonim Sirketi, together with its subsidiaries, engages in contracting, agriculture, investment, and services businesses in Turkey and internationally. It specializes in the construction of petroleum, gas and petrochemical facilities, pipelines, land and sea terminals, tank farms, oil refineries, off-shore platforms, pumping and compressor stations, power plants, industrial facilities, highways, metro and railroad projects, sports complexes, infrastructure, and other civil engineering projects. The company is also involved in engineering, manufacturing, management, and agriculture-shipping agency services. In addition, it offers fertilizers, and seeds. Further, the company engages in the production of seedlings and saplings; and marine terminal services, and free zone and fuel station management. Additionally, it engages in the insurance brokerage and studio management businesses. Tekfen Holding Anonim Sirketi was founded in 1956 and is based in Istanbul, Turkey.

YAYLA.IS.short_name: YAYLA EN. UR. TUR. VE INS
YAYLA.IS.long_name: Yayla Enerji Üretim Turizm ve Insaat Ticaret A.S.
YAYLA.IS.summary: Yayla Enerji Ãretim Turizm ve Insaat Ticaret A.S. operates in the building construction industry in Turkey. The company undertakes energy and tourism construction projects. It also invests in the renewable and clean energy projects. The company was founded in 1950 and is headquartered in Ankara, Turkey.

YYAPI.IS.summary: Yesil Yapi EndÃ¼strisi A.S. operates as a construction company in Turkey and internationally. It undertakes the construction of industrial plants, villas, commercial business centers, hospitals, housing projects, educational buildings, hotels, restoration and renovation projects, shopping malls, and cultural centers. The company was founded in 1979 and is headquartered in Istanbul, Turkey.
